scripts.dev: concurrently -n "BACKEND,ADMIN,PUBLIC" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgGreen.bold" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:public"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd savitri-backend && npm install && cd ../savitri-admin && npm install && cd ../savitri-public && npm install
scripts.clean: concurrently "cd savitri-backend && rm -rf node_modules" "cd savitri-admin && rm -rf node_modules" "cd savitri-public && rm -rf node_modules"
scripts.clean:install: npm run clean && npm run install:all
